listitem.para: Specify what address to put in IKEv2 REDIRECT notify payloads (where to redirect the other end). Both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses are supported as well the FQDNs. Only one address should be specified. All IKEv2 exchanges will be immediately (in IKE_SA_INIT reply) redirected to the given address.
The value of this option is not considered at all if global-redirect is set to off.
